definition: to sound (old, foreign, exciting, right etc)/to ring (true)/to sound as if (i.e. to give the listener an impression)/to hear from somewhere
(literary pronunciation, still advocated in Taiwan) to rule/to sentence/to allow
to listen/to hear/to obey/a can (loanword from English "tin")/classifier for canned beverages
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next

sentences.chinese: 這消息我是間接聽來的。

sentences.english: The radio was bellowing frightfully, and I thought the speaker's voice sounded familiar.
sentences.chinese: 收音機傳來可怕的咆哮聲，且我覺得那聲音聽來熟悉。

sentences.english: There was an audible stillness. in which the common voice sounded strange.
sentences.chinese: 四周一片聽的見的寂靜，連平常的聲音聽來也覺異樣。

sentences.english: He began to breathe at last, but his voice was unsteady.
sentences.chinese: 他終於開始吸上一口氣，但他的聲音聽來顫顫微微的。

sentences.english: The Muslim ear tends to hear "godless" with the pronunciation of this word.
sentences.chinese: 在穆斯林聽來這個詞含有“邪惡的”意味。

sentences.english: Such the word "revolution" sounded a bit horrible for me, but on his side it meant justice.
sentences.chinese: 這種詞在我聽來帶點兒恐怖，在他卻是義正辭嚴。

sentences.english: It all sounds suspiciously like the old capitalism to me.
sentences.chinese: 這一切在我聽來似乎都像舊資本主義。

sentences.english: It fell with a leaden weight on isabel's ears .
sentences.chinese: 這在伊莎貝爾聽來象鉛塊一樣沉重。

sentences.english: It sounded both familiar and exotic, feminine yet strong.
sentences.chinese: 聽來情切又不失異國風情，柔情似水又堅強有力。

sentences.english: " And he said, "Oh, I heard it on the grapevine.
sentences.chinese: 他說，“我打聽來的小道消息。”

sentences.english: A sensing person is good at looking and listening and generally getting to know the world.
sentences.chinese: 一個敏感的人擅長於看和聽來了解世界。

sentences.english: To the human ear, it may not sound like anything.
sentences.chinese: 人類的耳朵聽來，這個聲音可能什麼都像。

sentences.english: We live a cute life, soundfematic.
sentences.chinese: 我有個可愛的人生，聽來很娘。

sentences.english: Diana had a voice toned, to my ear, like the cooing of a dove.
sentences.chinese: 黛安娜的聲調在我聽來象鴿子的咕咕聲。

sentences.english: His excuse about the train being late doesn't ring true to me.
sentences.chinese: 他推說是火車誤點了，這話聽來不真實。
